# cook your code here
def rev(n):
    rev = 0
    while(n>0):
        rev = rev*10+n%10
        n=n//10
    return rev

def pal(n):
    if(n==rev(n)):
        return True
    else:
        return False

n = int(raw_input())
for i in range(n):
    k = int(raw_input())
    c=0
    while(pal(k)==False):
        k = k + rev(k)
        c=c+1
    print c,k
